text.section: In this article the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board of Review" means the Board of Review of the Department.
"County" means a county of this State and, unless expressly provided otherwise, Baltimore City.
"Department" means the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene.
"Includes" or "including" means includes or including by way of illustration and not by way of limitation.
"Oral competency" means general English-speaking proficiency as evidenced by achievement of a passing score obtained on a Board approved standardized test.
"Person" means an individual, receiver, trustee, guardian, personal representative, fiduciary, or representative of any kind and any partnership, firm, association, corporation, or other entity.
"Physician" means, except in Title 14 of this article, an individual who is authorized by a law of this State to practice medicine in this State.
"Secretary" means the Secretary of Health and Mental Hygiene.

"State" means:
A state, possession, or territory of the United States;
The District of Columbia; or
The Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.

"Substantial financial interest" means:
An asset with a fair market value of $1,000 or more; or
A source of income of $500 or more in a calendar year.
